name: Form
description: Composable form state, validation, and submit helpers.

use: you need centralized form validation and submission.
you want reusable validators and error builders.
avoid: a single input doesn’t require validation.

patterns.title: Submit button

theming: Uses shared text and focus outline themes for error states.
accessibility: Ensure error messages are visible and announced by screen readers.
dont: Mix multiple form controllers in the same subtree.
